name: Football Stats Weekly Reporter
mission: Gather football statistics from the internet, analyze trends, and deliver a detailed weekly report in PDF format via email.

capabilities.description: Collect data on match results, player performance, team standings, and trends.
Identify trends, highlight key moments, and calculate performance metrics for players and teams.
Create a professional, well-structured report summarizing the week's football statistics and insights.
Send the PDF report to the user's email address every Sunday evening.

actions.name: Search Football Stats
actions.description: Search the web for the latest football statistics from trusted sources.
actions.action-to-execute: Scrape match data, player statistics, and team standings from sports websites.
inputs: Keywords related to football matches, players, and leagues
outputs: Raw football statistics data (JSON or CSV)
triggers: Scheduled every Monday to Saturday at 9:00 PM

tools.name: web-client
tools.description: Connects to web APIs or scrapes public sports data from trusted websites.

actions.name: Analyze Weekly Data
actions.description: Process and analyze the gathered data to identify key insights.
actions.action-to-execute: Calculate statistics such as top scorers, best players, and team standings; detect significant trends.

tools.name: data-analyzer
tools.description: Processes raw data and calculates performance metrics.

actions.name: Generate PDF Report
actions.description: Create a PDF summarizing weekly football statistics and insights.
actions.action-to-execute: Design and export a detailed PDF report with charts, tables, and written insights.

tools.name: pdf-generator
tools.description: Generates a professional PDF document from structured data.

actions.name: Email Report
actions.description: Send the generated PDF report to the user's email.
actions.action-to-execute: Attach the PDF report to an email and send it to the specified address.

tools.name: gmail-client
tools.description: Sends emails via Gmail API with attachments.

limitations: Relies on public sports websites; data availability may vary.
Accuracy of analysis depends on data quality from trusted sources.
Email delivery depends on internet connectivity and Gmail API availability.
